subject: Module/shifter
description_text:
Hello.. i have the pro pedals. How can i put a shifter at module first
version?(V4)

conversations.body_text: Hi Giorgos Pourgouris,  Only a sequential shifter can be connected, using two button inputs with a total of four wires. Please take a photo of your device and then configure it using Freejoy.
Can you send me the wiring diagram? I have sq shifter with 2 buttons

Hi Giorgos Pourgouris,  From left to right, connect the two wires to the normally open pins of the micro switch, then configure the corresponding pins as button_GND in Freejoy. After that, perform the test. You will need to refer to the Freejoy GitHub for more details.
